about.title: Engineer | Developer | Graphic Designer
about.bio:
I am Jitendra Singh Rajpurohit. I am pursuing my Engineering in Electronics and Communication Domain at School of Engineering & Technology, Jain University.

I am a freelancer Graphic Designer. I have worked with many clients and Esports Organizations. I love to Create and Design.

I have learned to become obsessed with the problem - it allows me to derive the most valuable insights for potential solutions. I solve problems in creative ways. Recently started my journey as Web Developer and Web Designer.
